text: I m  M and want to die I left a lengthy post on r Advice earlier and got no responses  I guess that shouldn t be surprising  Other people s problems can be tedious  Nobody wants to help someone who s helpless or a bad investment  People pretend to care but they don t really care until you re dead and it no longer matters to anyone but themselves Anyway I once had a lot of potential  Then my dad and others sabotaged me  leading to an endless cycle of accidental self sabotage  I m now deeply in debt  trapped in a disrepaired house  and extremely depressed with no degree and no resume  I have a loving wife  That actually makes this much worse because I know I ve brought her into this mess  Nobody would willingly walk into this mess Killing myself seems to be the best choice  It d suck for my wife and mother  and sting a little for the other people that once knew me  but  hey   k in life insurance could pay off the debt I leave behind  and give her a new start  I m not able to get myself out of this on my own anyway Not sure whether to use my gun  which is fairly low caliber  or buy a new one  but I m sure I d need to go somewhere other than this house  Probably over the ocean where sea life can consume my body  Not sure if a corpse is needed for life insurance to pay out  so I guess I should look into that  Also don t want my dead body to blow a ton of money for the city or coast guard that has to come looking for me  If killing myself wasn t so complicated  or if I didn t have anybody depending upon me  I d have done it already
